thread.title: JP
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by JP

author: JP
title: JP
text: Purchased the CFX model vape last week after reading a review from the website vaporizerwizard.com struggled with it in the beginning but after reading some feedback in a forum I was able to use it properly. I enjoy intense long lasting highs that keep me energized. Before I sleep I use my pipe cause I can't sleep when I'm vaping. Love it! The CFX vape was an amazing investment! :)
